subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Angola and Tunisia each won, 3-1, in Tamale, Ghana, to improve their chances of qualifying for the quarterfinals of the African Cup of Nations.Angola rallied to top Senegal, and Tunisia easily defeated South Africa.Angola and Tunisia play Thursday in their final first-round games; each will advance with a tie.
